description: Pony Town is an online sandbox game that allows users to design unique avatars, build and decorate small plots of land, and participate in role-playing or casual conversations with other players. Players can use tools like action bars to perform animations or emotes (stored in PTA files), such as giggling, kissing, and nodding, to enhance their interactions with others.

You can export a PTA file from Pony Town to store actions by selecting the gear icon in the upper-right corner of the game and then choosing Actions . You can then select Export actions to download the PTA file.
